definition: to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: The author used smear from Stensen, s duct aspiration to observe exfoliated cytology in order to help diagnosis of early mumps.
sentences.chinese: 作者應用腮腺導管內吸液塗片觀察脫落細胞情況。

sentences.english: The sputum acid-fast stain showed positive (one plus) and the culture yielded nontuberculous mycobacterium.
sentences.chinese: 痰液抗酸性塗片爲陽性且培養結果爲非結核分枝桿菌。

sentences.english: The diagnosis of aplastic anemia was confirmed by bone marrow smear and histology.
sentences.chinese: 骨髓塗片及組織學檢查確診爲再障。

sentences.english: Bone marrow trephine biopsy as well as smear for cytological examination were conducted.
sentences.chinese: 骨髓穿刺活檢同時作骨髓塗片檢查。

sentences.english: Demonstrate the techniques for preparing intraoperative cytology smears.
sentences.chinese: 掌握製備術中細胞學塗片的技術。

sentences.english: Electron microscope was used to observe H22 cells 12 days after peritoneal injection.
sentences.chinese: 腹腔注射後第12天電鏡觀察各組腹水瘤細胞塗片。

sentences.english: A proportion of subjects with negative smear results underwent bronchoalveolar lavage .
sentences.chinese: 一部分受試者的陰性塗片結果行支氣管肺泡灌洗。

sentences.english: Chronic period often cannot find clap diplococcus on smear.
sentences.chinese: 慢性期在塗片上往往找不到淋病雙球菌。

sentences.english: The routine examination of smear of bone marrow should be performed for correct stagings and guide of clinical treatment.
sentences.chinese: 爲正確分期和指導臨牀治療，應常規行骨髓塗片檢查。

sentences.english: The nail lysate method revealed advantages of high positive rate and time saving procedure.
sentences.chinese: 溶甲塗片方法還具有陽性率高和省時的優點。

sentences.english: She spotted a little blood onto the smear.
sentences.chinese: 她把一點兒血滴到了塗片上。

sentences.english: The alteration of the intestinal flora were estimated by culture and smears of the cecal contents.
sentences.chinese: 以培養和塗片檢查法，觀察腸道菌羣的變化。

sentences.english: Methods TB was detected by smearing directly or smearing of concentrated sputum and by sputum culturing.
sentences.chinese: 痰中結核桿菌的檢測方法常規採用痰塗片及痰培養。

sentences.english: She assured the White House that the smears were untrue.
sentences.chinese: 她讓白宮對塗片檢查都是不真實的。

sentences.english: TB is usually diagnosed by looking at a sputum smear under a microscope.
sentences.chinese: 通常，結核病是採用痰液塗片鏡檢的方式診斷的。

definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
to store/to have sth in storage
(med.) endothelium/thin skin on the inside of some fruits (e.g. oranges)
lit. the cicada sheds its carapace (idiom); fig. to vanish leaving an empty shell/a crafty escape plan
